item.title: The EV Tax Credit Is Dead… or Is It? Here’s a New Loophole
item.description: Ford and GM use IRS loophole to extend $7,500 EV tax credit on select lease deals.

item.title: 6 Federal Services That Won’t Be Affected by the Government Shutdown
item.description: From Medicare to mail delivery, these services should continue despite shutdown disruptions and agency furloughs.

item.title: Current Mortgage Rates: October 3, 2025
item.description: Freddie Mac's rate for a 30-year fixed-rate mortgage increased for the second week in a row, averaging 6.34% for the week ending October 2.
